segments.text: Why are you leaving your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not so satisfied with it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you plan to change your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm now a secretary in my present work unit . My work is not interesting . I have to type , make copies , book tickets and so on . Everyday I follow the routine . Furthermore , I have studied English for four years at university , but I can ’ t use it there . They are the reasons I plan to change my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you interested in working with this company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One of my relatives told me that your company needs someone who can speak English . That's just the job that I have been looking for
segments.speaker: S2
